text:
hey, I've tested it again, facing the same issue
this is the `integrationThreadId: 8465029897`, also the portalId: `48448169`

Hello Everyone,
I’ve just finished creating my first custom channel and connecting it to a test account, so much so that I can now see it as active among the channels available for my inbox.

However, when I try to publish the first incoming message via API (<https://api.hubapi.com/conversations/v3/custom-channels/:channelId/messages>), I get the following error:

`{"status": "error","message": "Channel 477835 not found","correlationId": "82db6b59-1eec-472c-999a-c5efd1b08e52","context": {"channelId": ["477835"]},"category": "OBJECT_NOT_FOUND","subCategory": "ChannelIntegrationMessagePublishError.CHANNEL_DOES_NOT_EXIST"}`

as if the channel doesn’t exist. What am I doing wrong?
Thanks in advance for your help!
ok thanks, will look into it
